sentence.text: Overall, our findings show how the tumor suppressor regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination is regulated in hepatocellular carcinoma and establish the mechanism underlying positive regulation of protein ubiquitination-mediated tumorigenesis in this disease.Significance: These findings provide mechanistic insights into regulation of the tumor suppressive sirtuin SIRT6 and its implications for the development of hepatocellular carcinoma.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: In mouse models of hepatocellular carcinoma, regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination downregulation and consequent induction of ANXA2 were critical for UBE3A-mediated tumorigenesis.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
